copy.chatter: Fires and looting followed the funeral of 25-year-old Freddie Gray, an unarmed black man in police custody.
copy.project_share: Powerful raw videos from the Baltimore riots via @usatoday

videos.body: The Maryland National Guard arrives to help keep the piece in the wake of riots in Baltimore.
The Maryland National Guard arrives to help keep the piece in the wake of riots in Baltimore.
Firefighters fight a fire set by looters at a CVS store in Baltimore.
Protestors clash with police during the Baltimore riots.
An elder-care community center being built by the Southern Baptist Church burns in Baltimore.
videos.audio_credit: Pastor Dante Hickman, Southern Baptist Church

videos.body: Cars burn as protestors taunt police during the Baltimore riots
